name: X-Plane 11
description: The future of flight simulation is now! X-Plane 11 is the detailed, realistic, and modern simulator youâ€™ve been waiting for. Intuitive user interface, 3-D cockpits, new effects, 3-D sound, living airports and world-wide scenery.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8.1, or 10, 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i3, i5, or i7 CPU with 2 or more cores, or AMD equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11-capable video card from NVIDIA or AMD w/512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 20 GB available space Sound Card: Default Additional Notes: The disk requirements are based on how many world scenery areas are downloaded.  Minimum with one scenery area is 20 GB . Additional scenery areas can be downloaded at no charge at any time after purchase
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8.1, or 10, 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K at 3.5 ghz or faster Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 12-capable video card from NVIDIA or AMD w/4 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 65 GB available space Sound Card: Default Additional Notes: The disk requirements are based on how many world scenery areas are downloaded.  Minimum with one scenery area is 20 GB . Additional scenery areas can be downloaded at no charge at any time after purchase
